description: TaxCut was used in the 2000s until H&R Block replaced the application in the 2009 tax year with H&R Block At Home. H&R Block then rebranded At Home software as Tax Software.

When a user works on a tax return and saves their progress, the software creates the T03 file to store the information. After saving a tax return, users can close the T03 file, then reopen it to work on it further.
